Category: Facial Cleanser

Methylaminopropionate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cocamide Mea, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Peg-150, Behenyl Alcohol, Peg-10 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Disodium Edta, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Lauryl Hydroxysultaine, Dipotassium

Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Disodium Edta, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Lauryl Hydroxysultaine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Alcohol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Natto Gum.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
